userInterface

Class GameMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • userInterface.GameMenu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class GameMenu
extends javax.swing.JLabel
    Virtual Optics

    This class represents the in game menu that is displayed when the user clicks on the icon that is on the top left corner of the Lab or Level panel

    Author:
    Darrin Fong, Tieme Togola
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
